roleset.name: cause to die
roleset.note: MASSACRE-V NOTES: Frames file for 'massacre' based on sentences in ectb. Verbnet entry 42.1, along with other assorted verbs of killing. (from massacre.01-v predicate notes)
MASSACRE-N NOTES: Automatically created by Julia as an alias file for unification. (from massacre.01-n)

example.text: The government that-1 *T*-1 established the policy of * massacring wolves lost the election.
